word_mean: 冬眠：某些动物过冬的休眠状态，其特征为麻醉状态和体温与代谢活动明显下降。参见estivation项下
某些动物为抵御冬季低温等不利生活条件的一种适应性休眠状态。
一些恒温动物在冬季长时间不活动、不摄食而进入睡眠状态并伴随着体温和代谢速率降低的一种越冬对策。

sentence.Network_en: Bears wake up in the spring after a winter of hibernation.
sentence.Network_cn: 熊经过一个冬天的冬眠后在春季苏醒.

sentence.Network_en: At the first cold of autumn, many insects go into hibernation.
sentence.Network_cn: 入秋第一阵寒潮刚到, 许多昆虫就进入了冬眠.

sentence.Network_en: The tortoise spends the winter months in hibernation.
sentence.Network_cn: 乌龟在冬眠中度过寒冬季节.

means.word_mean: 1. the torpid or resting state in which some animals pass the winter
2. cessation from or slowing of activity during the winter; especially slowing of metabolism in some animals
3. the act of retiring into inactivity;

sentences.sentence: "he emerged from his hibernation to make his first appearance in several years"
